perturbation.original_text: FCC will throughout the Term maintain adequate manufacturing capacity and staffing to manufacture the Terpene Product pursuant to the terms hereof at the Facility.
perturbation.changed_text: FCC will throughout the Term attempt to maintain manufacturing capacity and staffing to manufacture the Terpene Product pursuant to the terms hereof at the Facility.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states FCC 'will maintain' adequate capacity, creating an obligation. The modified text says FCC 'will attempt to maintain,' making the capacity obligation non-binding. This creates uncertainty about FCC's responsibility to consistently supply Terpene Product, potentially impacting Flotek's operations.

perturbation.original_text: Shipments of Terpene Product to Flotek must be made by FCC from FCC's facility within three (3) days of the date of the applicable purchase order. Delivery terms shall be FOB Winter Haven, Florida. Transportation shall be arranged by Flotek. All sales of Terpene Product subject to this Agreement shall be pursuant to the terms and conditions attached hereto as Exhibit B.
perturbation.changed_text: Shipments of Terpene Product to Flotek should be made by FCC from FCC's facility within five (5) business days of the date of the applicable purchase order. Delivery terms shall be FOB Winter Haven, Florida. Transportation shall be arranged by Flotek. All sales of Terpene Product subject to this Agreement shall be pursuant to the terms and conditions attached hereto as Exhibit B.
perturbation.explanation: The original text says 'must be made within three (3) days', and the modified version says 'should be made within five (5) business days'. This creates ambiguity around the strictness of the shipping timeline. While the original says the shipping MUST be done within the time frame, the changed version says the shipping SHOULD be done, creating a contradiction between the two sections.

perturbation.original_text: FCC may not assign or delegate its rights or obligations pursuant to this Agreement. Subject to the foregoing, this Agreement shall be binding upon each of the parties upon their execution, and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their successors and assigns. Any assignee whatsoever will be bound by the obligations of the assigning party under this Agreement, and any assignment shall not diminish the liability or obligation of the assignor under the terms of this Agreement unless otherwise agreed.
perturbation.changed_text: FCC may assign its rights or obligations pursuant to this Agreement with written approval from Flotek. Subject to the foregoing, this Agreement shall be binding upon each of the parties upon their execution, and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their successors and assigns. Any assignee whatsoever will be bound by the obligations of the assigning party under this Agreement, and any assignment shall not diminish the liability or obligation of the assignor under the terms of this Agreement unless otherwise agreed.
perturbation.explanation: The original text explicitly states that 'FCC may not assign' its rights or obligations, while the changed text says that 'FCC may assign' its rights or obligations, creating a contradiction about what FCC may or may not do.
